name: Hidden Home
description:
Hidden Home is a short thriller game (unfinished) about a man who comes home from a rough day of work, though work won't be the only thing that'll make his life hard after tonight. It might as well be his last.

The game was made in Unity together with my girlfriend for a 48h game jam. I did the programming and animated the main character while she made all of the art assets!

The sounds effects are from freesounds.org and were edited in Audacity

Notice

I forgot to change the export settings, so some texture might contain horrible colors. The framerate and dialogue speed are really low for some reason., especially in the HTML5 build.
